Some questions that should give us more focus:

=== Who is our ideal target to become a convert? ===
* uses the computer for: web, mail, chat, office, simple games, import & view photos, play music & video, print
* technical knowledge:
** basic understanding of GUI and filesystem concepts
** preferably no or little time invested in MS Windows ("but I did this Word course! Does this mean I would have to start over again?")
** preferably no Unix/Posix/Linux knowledge
* age:
** old enough to take things seriously
** old enough to be able to get hold of a machine to run Ubuntu on exclusively
** old enough to be taken seriously
* sex: female
* level of education: higher education or equivalent through experience
* areas of interest: preferably outside IT
* job (if any): work with young people
* spare time: local community volunteer work, ...
* world view: openness
